snippet.title: Camp Buddy - ‘Greatest Memories’ (Official Opening Video)
snippet.description:
BLits Games debuts with its first project: BL / Yaoi / Gay Visual Novel - 'Camp Buddy'!

Follow the adventures of Keitaro Nagame as he goes to a scout-themed summer camp called Camp Buddy along with his best friend! Keitaro will meet new friends and have exciting adventures in camp, eventually finding romance with one of his fellow campers, Hiro, Yoichi, Natsumi or Hunter. It's time to take the chance and make the greatest memories!

NOTE: Video was reuploaded to account for an actor recast and additional changes in Taiga Route DLC! Thank you for 450k+ views and all of heartwarming comments  on the original upload!

VIDEO CREDITS:
Opening Song: 'Greatest Memories'
Composed by: HMNK
Vocals by: KENO (TechniKen)
Lyrics by: Zael
Opening Video Animation by: Dino

-------------------------------------------------
IMPORTANT DISCLAIMER:
The story, persons, places, characters, and events presented in Camp Buddy and are purely fictional and not intended to depict real persons, places, characters, and events. Any correlation with natural persons (living or deceased), places, characters, and events are entirely coincidental.   Said fictional characters depicted in Camp Buddy and all BLits Games' characters are not under the age of eighteen (18) years old.  All relevant information concerning the characters can be found on their respective individual profiles on our website.
